subject: Weather
PGA Championship
Golf
lead_paragraph: For a PGA Tour on-site meteorologist, pop-up thunderstorms, fast-moving cold fronts, coastal fog and shifting winds are just a few of the occupational hazards.
snippet: For a PGA Tour on-site meteorologist, pop-up thunderstorms, fast-moving cold fronts, coastal fog and shifting winds are just a few of the occupational hazards.
